processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.description: Orders are typically processed within {days} (Monday-Friday, excluding holidays) after payment confirmation. Custom or personalized items may require additional processing time, as specified on their product pages.

shippingMethods.title: Shipping Methods & Costs
shippingMethods.description: We offer various shipping options to meet your needs. Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location, the weight of your order, and the selected shipping method.

international.title: International Shipping:
international.description: Delivery times vary by destination, typically 7-21 business days. Customs duties and taxes may apply and are the responsibility of the recipient.

tracking.title: Tracking Your Order
tracking.description: Once your order has shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email containing your tracking number. You can use this number to track your package's journey.

eligibility.title: Eligibility for Returns
eligibility.description: We accept returns of unused and undamaged items within {days} of the purchase date. Items must be in their original packaging with all tags attached.

initiate.title: How to Initiate a Return
initiate.description: To start a return, please contact our customer service team at {email} with your order number and reason for return. We will provide you with instructions and a return shipping label if applicable.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Once your return is received and inspected, we will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment within 7-10 business days.

exchanging.title: Exchanging an Item
exchanging.description: If you need to exchange an item for a different size, color, or product, please contact us. Exchanges are subject to product availability. We recommend returning the original item for a refund and placing a new order for the desired item to ensure a faster process.

damaged.title: Damaged or Defective Items
damaged.description: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us immediately (within 7 days of delivery) with photos of the damage. We will arrange for a replacement or a full refund.

shippingCosts.title: Return Shipping Costs
shippingCosts.description: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is damaged, defective, or an error occurred on our part.

contact.description: For any further questions regarding shipping or returns, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support.
